name: Jubeat Festo
description:
Released to celebrate the 10th Anniversary of the franchise, Jubeat Festo has been redesigned to include a tropical, botanical atmosphere and colourful design.

Like previous Jubeat games, Jubeat Festo has players touching the panels according to the rhythm. The more panels the player can hit correctly, the more points they score.

This version includes a significant update to "jubility" evaluation, and the "jubility" value can be checked for each song (with special effects appearing as the numbers go up).
